about_the_game:
EarthRoyale is a map observation game where you watch the map as it constantly changes due to different events!
This demo version got all full game events, but does not include the full games paint mode, workshop support, start customizations and event odds modes, so you can only play with the base normal country map and not edit the game in any way.
detailed_description:
EarthRoyale is a map observation game where you watch the map as it constantly changes due to different events!
This demo version got all full game events, but does not include the full games paint mode, workshop support, start customizations and event odds modes, so you can only play with the base normal country map and not edit the game in any way.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Gentoo Linux Kernel: 15.5.47
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 6600XT
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 built-in
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: EarthRoyale Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ & Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: Intel(R) HD Graphics 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: The demo for EarthRoyale, a map observation game where each turn. the map changes in different ways
